short_summary: Excavation services for the Correctional Service of Canada institutions, Bowden and Pusaestaw.
description: This is a contracting opportunity for a firm to provide excavation and earthworks services for the Correctional Service of Canada institutions. The work will consist of general excavation, supply and installation of utility piping and conduits, and associated accessories. Services are to be provided as requested by CSC. The contract is for a period of 2 years with 1 option year period.

# Tender Announcement for Excavating Services

## Tender Information

* **Title**: EP922-231175 Excavating Contractor Services
* **Reference Number**: WS3760936113-Doc3766026661
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3760936113
* **Publication Date**: December 5, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 22, 2022, at 2:00 PM MST
* **Cancellation Date**: This tender was previously announced but is now cancelled

## Tender Details

* **UNSPSC Code**: 22101500 - Earth Moving Machinery
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Agency**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **Location**: Bowden Institution and Innisfail, Alberta
* **Scope of Work**: General excavation work, including supply and installation of utility piping/conduits and associated accessories as and when required

## Delivery and Option Period

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Delivery Period**: Two (2) years, with a one (1) year subsequent option period

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Note**: This tender was cancelled. There will be no further updates or notices. This entry was for archival purposes only.
